With his [[Shikotsumyaku]], [[Kimimaro]] pulls from his body a bone, such as an [[Wikipedia:Humerus|upper arm bone]], that he's modified to use as a sword. With it he repeatedly stabs at his target, doing so rapidly enough to create the appearance of afterimages. Each stab is directed at a slightly different part of the target, from a slightly different angle, and with slightly different regularity, making it difficult to predict each strike. Although targets may be able to dodge Kimimaro's attacks for a time, they will eventually be unable to keep up with the constant and "chaotic" strikes, giving Kimimaro the opening he needs to finally stab and kill them.<ref name="d2"/>

== Trivia ==
* [[wikipedia:camellia|Camellia]]s are tall evergreen trees that grow in warm regions. A camellia's leaves are shiny and rigid and its flowers are red and white.<ref>''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 207</ref>
